product_name: REI Animal Reversible Bucket Hat - Infant/Toddler Boys'
long_description: The REI Animal Reversible bucket hat is 2 hats in 1; choose the solid side or a colorful plaid depending on your toddler's outfit or mood. Lightweight and collapsible, this hat provides easy packability for quickly stowing in a pocket or purse. Cotton is soft, breathable and comfortable. Rip-and-stick chin strap helps secure the hat when the wind blows; solid side features a small pocket with rip-and-stick flap closure.
short_description: The REI Animal Reversible bucket hat is 2 hats in 1; choose the solid side or a colorful plaid depending on your toddler's outfit or mood.
